attributes.action: ensure that DEFRA is prevented from becoming the lead government agency involved in protecting the UK and its citizens in the event of an outbreak of the bird flu.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the staggering incompetence shown by Government departments now incorporated within DEFRA in handling the BSE and Foot and Mouth incidents it is imperative that at all times any other Government agency is the lead agency in protecting the public and the United Kingdom's economic interests.
